name: kutty
description: Kutty is a tailwind plugin for building web applications. It has a set of accessible and reusable components that are commonly used in web applications built in.
author: praveenjuge

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss main.css -o static/build.css --watch" "hugo server --disableFastRender" "rollup -c -w"
